EXERCISE

Create a script in kate that creates a new location using
/home/user/ost4sem/exercise/basic_adv_gdalogr/fagus_sylvatica/2020_TSSP_IM-ENS-A2-SP20_43023435.tif
and import all the 20?0_TSSP_I?-ENS-A2-SP20_43023435.tif from the folder /home/user/ost4sem/exercise/basic_adv_gdalogr/fagus_sylvatica/.

  • Create a new grassdb/location ( see GRASS70 Create Location using ancillary layer )
  • Set the GRASS70 variables (see Setting GRASS70 variables for GRASS bash job)
  • Search the command that import tif in grass
  • Write a loop that import all the *.tif, use basename to remove the extension.
  • Use g.list rast to see if you import correctly the data

If everything is seat correctly you should be able to run the script by bash CreateLocation_enterGRASS7.sh
